name: Aaishaa
greetingText: Was really looking forward to this day!!
wishText: Thank you for always being there for me and adding that spark to my life.To more years ahead ❣️ ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Aaishaa!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
